Body:
parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
parser.add_argument('-p', '--port', type=int, default=0, help=
    'The port to use, 0 means random port; default: %(default)s')
parser.add_argument('--scan', '--scan-config', dest='scan_config', action=
    'store_true', help=
    'If given, a config file will be processed at startup if it exists')
parser.add_argument('--scan-file', '--scan-config-file', dest=
    'scan_config_file', default='/media/usb/hedgehog.conf', help=
    'Location of the config file to scan; default: %(default)s')
parser.add_argument('--config-file', dest='config_file', default=
    'hedgehog.conf', help='The hedgehog config file; default: %(default)s')
parser.add_argument('--logging-conf', dest='logging_conf', help=
    'If given, logging is configured from this file')
if simulator:
    parser.add_argument('--sensors', '--simulate-sensors', dest=
        'simulate_sensors', action='store_true', help=
        'If given, noisy sensor readings will be simulated')
return parser.parse_args()
